modName: No Steel Imperial Gauntlets And Shin Boots
summary: For the man who likes his arms and legs matching the rest of his body.
descriptionHtml:
If you\'re pedantic like me and think the Steel Imperial Gauntlets and Steel Shin Boots clash too much with the rest of the Steel apparel, you\'re in luck.

Every chest, merchant, bandit, sellsword and God knows what else have had their inventory removed of those Cyrodilic annoyances. Now, every Steel Gauntlet is Cuffed and every Steel Boot is Nordic.

If the game goes spastic because of this plugin, you can always come to me and complain.
author: MarshalToy
